name: Ch19BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Duessel;So we're agreed then?|Winner of this contest of strength claims the special reward?
speak;Garcia;Heh! I hope you two are prepared to lose.|These arms haven't failed me yet!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|This will be a glorious contest!|I, Dozla, shall demonstrate the might that has served Lady L'Arachel!
speak;Duessel;Let's begin with something simple.|Those logs need splitting for the campfire.
speak;Duessel;...|There. Twenty logs split with a single strike of my axe.
speak;Garcia;...|Thirty logs, and I didn't even need to use a weapon.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|A fine display!|But now it's Dozla's turn!
speak;Dozla;...|Forty logs, split and arranged into a perfect stack!
speak;Duessel;Well done.|But that was merely a warm-up.|Let's move to something more challenging.
speak;Garcia;See that boulder over there?|I bet I can lift it over my head.
speak;Garcia;HRAAAAGH!|There!|What do you say to that?
speak;Duessel;Good, but...|I'll lift two such boulders!
speak;Duessel;HRAAAAAH!|Witness the strength earned through decades of battle!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Most impressive!|But I, Dozla, shall not be outdone!
speak;Dozla;HROOOOAAAAH!|Three boulders and a tree trunk!|Is that not the height of strength?!
speak;Garcia;Hmm...|We seem to be running out of things to lift.
speak;Duessel;Indeed...|And we're all quite evenly matched.
speak;Garcia;What if we try to—|Wait, what was the reward again?
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|It was that last bottle of Rausten's finest spirits!
speak;Duessel;You know...|Perhaps we could simply share it.
speak;Garcia;Now that you mention it...|Three veterans enjoying a drink together sounds better than any contest.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|A splendid idea!|We shall all be winners this day!
speak;Duessel;It's settled then.|To the mess tent, my friends!|Let us share tales of battle and glory!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|This is why warriors like us understand each other so well!
